ing: 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and coarsely chopped
1/2 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped - or to taste
1 pinch freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is magic in your mouth!  Thanks for bringing it to the party Butch!  Delicious with tortilla chips or served atop grilled chicken, pork, or mild white fish such as tilapia."
ins: In a serving bowl, lightly mix together the strawberries, avocado, red onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, lime juice, and black pepper. Serve immediately.
